bug.author: rohit-yadav
bug.description: Under Quick start subheading there is a typo in git clone https://github.com/Deezer/spleeter. Instead of the capital D, it should be small d. git clone https://github.com/deezer/spleeter -- this is the correct link Fixing this will allow anyone to clone the repository effortlessly.

comments.comment: Hi Rohit. Both urls are valid (capital of lowercase d) do you have an example configuration where it does make a difference ?
Hello Mmoussallam, If you try to git clone with the capital D in the link, it will not download and throw an error.
As seen in associated PR not considering this at the moment. Closing.
